sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of United Technologies Corp ( UTX ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.2%.
Year to date, United Technologies Corp registers a 18.5% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.6%.
Home Depot is showing a gain of 6.4% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Coca-Cola ( KO ), trading down 0.3%, and Boeing ( BA ), trading up 1.1% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
